Title: Vintage Universal 18K SOLID ROSE GOLD Men's Mechanical Watch! Serviced! pink ✅
Description: BEAUTIFUL SOLID 18K ROSE GOLD UNIVERSAL WATCH!EXCELLENT SHAPE! You are bidding on a beautiful Pre-Owned Universal Solid 18K Rose Gold Hand Wound Mechanical Men's Watch! This is a timeless piece from Universal, and simply a stunning piece of art for that discriminating buyer. Congratulations to the new owner, for you are in for an awesome watch which will definitely please. Features a SOLID 18K ROSE GOLD case, beautiful original dial with gold applied numbers, dark brown genuine snake strap, hand wound 264 mechanical movement, and stunning good looks. This watch looks phenomenal in person, the pictures do this watch no justice. Looks great whether it's dressed up in a suit or down with jeans - just a clean, classic looking watch which will never go out of style. Case measures 25.5 mm without the crown, 27 mm with the crown, 33 mm lug to lug, 19 mm between the lugs, and 8 mm in thickness with the crystal. This is a beautiful vintage Universal watch - it will no doubt become your new favorite timepiece. It is a great conversation piece, and one you will love to show off. Condition: This watch is in great condition throughout. Case is 18k Solid Rose Gold. The genuine snakeskin strap is brand new. Crystal is in good condition with some scratches - not noticeable inside, but will show "shadows" when in the sun. Not sure if crown is original to the watch. Dial and hands have a wonderful patina - looks fantastic in person. Please enlarge the photos above for best view - they are highly magnified and will show any flaws. Watch is in perfect working order and was serviced earlier this year - it keeps good time. Just a great watch which will give you years of enjoyment. There is no doubt the new owner will be very pleased with this watch - an excellent investment which you can wear and enjoy daily. FREE SHIPPING within the U.S. only. All other countries, shipping will be a discounted $65.00 via USPS Global Express Mail. Thanks for looking, and happy bidding - you will LOVE THIS WATCH!

ReturnPolicy.Description: If not happy with watch, you can return for a refund provided watch has NOT been altered in any way. 10% restocking fee will apply to cover shipping/insurance - item is exactly as described and shown in the photos. We will not accept returns for any item which has been worn or altered.
